derivation.yuyuan_name: late 18th cent.: modern Latin, from meno- 'of menstruation' + -rrhag-, stem of Greek rhēgnunai 'to burst'

means.word_mean: 1. abnormally heavy or prolonged menstruation; can be a symptom of uterine tumors and can lead to anemia if prolonged
